Summary: An orange flickering orb of light was seen flying across the sky. It suddenly turned to the left, continued moving, then stopped and slowly faded from view
divs: Sighting DetailsI was riding my bike to subway when i noticed an orange randomly flickering orb of light flying across the sky. It suddenly turned to the left, continued moving. I began to take a digital video with my phone, then shortly afterwards it stopped and slowly faded away until I couldn't see it any longer.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
